title: Metrics Store
short-description: New data store for native support of metrics data

title: GDI support for line metric protocols
short-description: Native support for metric data from statsD and CollectD agents

title: Metrics SPL Commands
short-description: New SPL commands specifically geared at working with metrics data

title: Machine Learning Toolkit 2.3 and 2.4
short-description: Introducing an improved ML-SPL API making it easier to import new algorithms, ARIMA algorithm for forecasting with ACF and PACF algorithms and a new model management interface with role-based access controls.

title: Faster Search Performance and Data Model Acceleration
short-description: Improvements to core search technology improve Data Model Acceleration times and summarization responsiveness.

title: Monitoring Console Views
short-description: New views for Regex CPU Profiling to help fine tune your environment.

title: Event Annotations
short-description: Overlay time-series charts with dynamic, discrete events to provide relevant context.

title: Chart Enhancements
short-description: Several new charting options to improve metric and multi-series monitoring use cases.

title: Report Actions Enhancements
short-description: Leverage custom actions within the scheduled report workflow.

title: Splunk Cloud Self-Service App Management
short-description: Splunk Cloud App Management provides self-service install, update, and uninstall of Splunk certified and internally built apps with the click of a button.
